T02TD2944E:24a-0: @24a * // rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2944E:24a-1: dam tshig spyod pa'i nges pas ni //
T02TD2944E:24a-2: mi smra ba dang mi bya nyid //
T02TD2944E:24a-3: spa ba dang ni de bzhin mchod //
T02TD2944E:24a-4: tshim bya yid la rnam par bsgom //
T02TD2944E:24a-5: mkhas pas gsad bya rmongs bya nyid //
T02TD2944E:24a-6: brgyad po 'di dag bsrung byas na //
T02TD2944E:24a-7: dam tshig tu ni yongs su grags //
T02TD2944E:24a-8: ci zhig mi smra zhe na ni //
T02TD2944E:24a-9: sngags dang rgyud kyi rang bzhin can //
T02TD2944E:24a-10: dam tshig spyod dang 'dre ba dang //
T02TD2944E:24a-11: brdzun du smra ba rtsub pa'i tshig /'khyal tshig gang yang smra mi bya //
T02TD2944E:24a-12: ci zhig mi bya zhe na ni //
T02TD2944E:24a-13: phra ma srog chags 'tshe ba dang //
T02TD2944E:24a-14: gtam gzhan rnams ni brnyas pa dang //
T02TD2944E:24a-15: sgyu dang phrag dog nga rgyal dang //
T02TD2944E:24a-16: rku dang g-yo ni bya ba min //
T02TD2944E:24a-17: ci zhig spa bar bya zhe na //
T02TD2944E:24a-18: rang sngags sngags kyi nor bu dang //
T02TD2944E:24a-19: chang dang rdzas kyi 'du ba dang //
T02TD2944E:24a-20: bden dngos spyod dang grol ba dang //
T02TD2944E:24a-21: dngos grub mtshan ma spa bar bya //
T02TD2944E:24a-22: ci zhig mchod par bya zhe na //
T02TD2944E:24a-23: byis pa nad pa bud med rgan //
T02TD2944E:24a-24: dman dang mgon med smad pa dang //
T02TD2944E:24a-25: bsnyen gnas dka' thub kyis nyon mongs //
T02TD2944E:24a-27: ci zhig tshim par bya zhe na //
T02TD2944E:24a-28: slob dpon med dang pha ma dang //
T02TD2944E:24a-29: lha dang zhing gi bdag bo dang //
T02TD2944E:24a-30: dur khrod pa yi 'byung po dang //
T02TD2944E:24a-31: mkha' 'gro ma rnams tshim par bya //
T02TD2944E:24a-32: ci zhig bsgom par bya zhe na //
T02TD2944E:24a-33: dkon mchog gsum dang de bzhin bdag / phyag rgya ye shes rang gi ngos //
T02TD2944E:24a-34: cha bcas pa dang cha med pa //
T02TD2944E:24b-0: bla ma sngags @24b kyang bsgom par bya //
T02TD2944E:24b-1: ci zhig gzhom par bya zhe na //
T02TD2944E:24b-2: chags dang gti mug de bzhin sman //
T02TD2944E:24b-3: le lo de bzhin mi dga' dang //
T02TD2944E:24b-4: dad pa med dang de bzhin brkam //
T02TD2944E:24b-5: dbang po'i gdon yang gzhom bar bya //
T02TD2944E:24b-6: ci zhig rmongs par bya zhe na //
T02TD2944E:24b-7: dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang //
T02TD2944E:24b-8: sdang dang phra ma can dang gdug / rgyal po 'khor dang sdig can dang //
T02TD2944E:24b-9: mi srun dag kyang rmongs par bya //
T02TD2944E:24b-10: dam tshig 'di dag bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2944E:24b-11: bsrungs nas dngos grub ster bar byed //
T02TD2944E:24b-12: dngos grub dam tshig sngom pa ni //
T02TD2944E:24b-13: khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2944E:24b-14: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang //
T02TD2944E:24b-15: byang chub sems kyang gtong mi bya //
T02TD2944E:24b-16: gnod par byed la byang sems bskyed //
T02TD2944E:24b-17: rdo rje'i spun la bsnyen bkur bya //
T02TD2944E:24b-18: dad pa med pa rab tu smod //
T02TD2944E:24b-19: slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya //
T02TD2944E:24b-20: zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te //
T02TD2944E:24b-21: bla ma la ni yon yang dbul //
T02TD2944E:24b-22: dngos po'i khyad par gang dang gang //
T02TD2944E:24b-23: mnyes phyir de la dbul bar bya //
T02TD2944E:24b-24: de bzhin bza' ba'i bye brag rnams //
T02TD2944E:24b-25: phongs pa med par dbul bar bya //
T02TD2944E:24b-26: gal te de la brnyas gyur na //
T02TD2944E:24b-27: sangs rgyas thams cad brnyas dang mtshungs //
T02TD2944E:24b-29: glen pa dgra dang rkun po dang //
T02TD2944E:24b-30: de bzhin gdon dang rims kyis thebs //
T02TD2944E:24b-31: rgyal po'i chad dang phra men dang //
T02TD2944E:24b-32: me dang chu dang stag dang dug / bsad nas sems can dmyal bar ltung //
T02TD2944E:24b-33: sems ni khro bar mi bya zhing //
T02TD2944E:24b-34: nam yang shes rab nyams mi bya //
T02TD2944E:24b-35: rtag tu khyod ni de ltar srungs //
T02TD2944E:24b-37: slob dpon padmas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
